name: Good morning, World!
description:
"Good Morning, World!" is a short text adventure game about a very enthusiastic Dude getting ready for work.

Writting and programming in Quest by me, vanilla_buns, and art by my good friend Morphosky

Play it here!

The game many different paths and some of the choices are available only once per playthrough, so please try playing it a few times to see everything!

If you have any comments or questions, you can find me on twitter at @vanilla_buns and Morphosky at @auntmorphriska. Also, check out Morphosky's website for more of her beautiful art!

Have a nice day ;D!
